name: Travel Riddles: Trip To India
description: India welcomes you with its riddles, ancient wisdom, exquisite aromas, spicery and lost treasures. Complete puzzle levels while travelling along the mighty Ganga River and find the forgotten temples of the past in the jungle forests.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.0 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 64 mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 64 mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
